ExpansionDef.label: Royalty
ExpansionDef.description: - Empire faction - Royal title progression for your colonists - Psychic powers for Empire nobles - Call Imperial troops - Tribal psychics link with anima trees - Psychic meditation - Procedural quests system with lots of quest content - Mechanoid clusters - Imperial ultratech melee weapons - Bond with persona weapons - Cataphract armor - Techprints - Imperial body implants - Royal victory quest - New music album
